name: Grim Rhythm
description:
Being a reaper ain't easy y'know? You gotta slice to a rhythm. A quite difficult one, at that...

CONTROLS:
Left Click and Right Click to slash in each direction, so...

Left Click is left slash
Right Click is right slash
